authors.name: You’ll come away with an understanding of what security tools are available to implement asymmetric end-to-end encryption and advanced case scenarios like multi-device access
group chat and digital signatures. And you’ll understand how to implement them in your App to protect Protected Health Information (PHI) as required by HIPAA regulations.Matheus Cardoso

description: It’s hard to innovate in a space when a simple coding mistake can cost you or your team millions of dollars in fines paid out for HIPAA violations. Luckily, with Apple’s HealthKit combined with other developer-first tools, you can confidently build a new App or add new features into your existing App without spending years or millions on outside security consultants.
